topic.title: Configure Administrator Auditing
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase administrators with full privileges can configure auditing using the Couchbase Web Console.

body.draft-comment: This task rolled under Security Tab for 4.5

note.p:
To configure administrator auditing, an administrator must have the following role:
Full administrator
To learn about administrative roles in Couchbase, see.

ol.li: Use the Enable check box to enable or disable auditing.
Specify the target directory path for storing the audit records.
Specify the log rotation time interval (in Days, Hours, or Minutes), after which the log gets rotated to the next file.

body.note: Auditing is only available in the Enterprise Edition of Couchbase Server.
